citations.#text: An air of strained expectancy pervades the great bleak shed. In the outer divisions – ‘Jacks’, ‘Seconds’, ‘Unattached’, ‘Blanks’ – the bell is hardly heard over the babel of four thousand voices

in The Permanent and Casual Waterside Workers’ Union (popularly known as jacks or scabs)

definition: a non-union labourer, a strike-breaker, spec. a member of the Permanent and Casual Waterside Workers’ Union
